GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Document Editor, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync), Adobe Acrobat Reader, Lync, Documents and Notes, Company Hub, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, PDF, Office 365
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Hands Free, Loudspeaker, Call Divert
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Headset, Charger, Handset, Quick Guide, Battery, SIM Door Key, Data Cable

Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: Noise Cancellation, Dolby Headphone, Cloud Music Offline Playback, Graphical Equalizer
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports 3G2, 3GP, MP4, M4V, WMV, AVI, MOV, Full HD

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v3, Supported Profiles (A2DP 1.2, HFP 1.5, OPP 1.1, AVRCP 1.4, PBAP 1.1)
Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, GLONASS, with HERE Maps, HERE Drive+

Other Features.Important Apps: Yahoo, Outlook Mobile, Gmail, Nokia Mail, Windows Live Messenger, Hotmail, Instant Messaging, Google Talk, Twitter, Yahoo Messenger, WhatsApp, Skype IM, Facebook, LinkedIn, Picasa, Flickr, YouTube, Music Apps
Other Features.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, Barometer, Gyroscope, Proximity Sensor, Accelerometer, Magnetometer

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: High Brightness Mode, PureMotion HD+, ClearBlack Technology, Nokia Glance Screen, Brightness Control, Corning Gorilla Glass 3, Sculpted Glass, Lumia Color Profile, Super Sensitive Touch, Sunlight Readability Enhancements, Wide Viewing Angle, Refresh Rate 60 Hz, Easy to Clean

Platform.Processor: 1.5 GHz + Qualcomm Snapdragon S4, Dual Core
